pageContext.claim: Former Maricopa County Sherif Joe Arpaio "has done a lot in the fight against illegal immigration. ... Is there anyone in local law enforcement who has done more to crack down on illegal immigration than Sheriff Joe? He has protected people from crimes and saved lives.”
pageContext.analysis: Former Maricopa County Sheriff Joe Arpaio became the face of the anti-illegal immigration movement, using controversial policing tactics that targeted Latinos. The Department of Justice found that the Arpaio's sheriff’s office engaged in systemic racial profiling of Latinos.
